definitions.definition: A particular weight class , or member of such, as prescribed by the rules, between that of the heavier welterweight and the lighter featherweight . See Wikipedia for the specifics of each sport.
A particular weight category as prescribed by the rules, separate from an open or heavyweight class.
A competitive weight division as prescribed by the rules, between the heavier middleweight and the lighter featherweight .
One of little consequence or ability .
A person who cannot handle their drink ; one who gets drunk on very little alcohol .
A political candidate with little chance of winning .

main_definition: ( combat sports ) A particular weight class , or member of such, as prescribed by the rules, between that of the heavier welterweight and the lighter featherweight . See Wikipedia for the specifics of each sport.
secondary_definitions: ( rowing ) A particular weight category as prescribed by the rules, separate from an open or heavyweight class.
( weightlifting ) A competitive weight division as prescribed by the rules, between the heavier middleweight and the lighter featherweight .
One of little consequence or ability .
A person who cannot handle their drink ; one who gets drunk on very little alcohol .
( by extension ) A person with low endurance .
A political candidate with little chance of winning .
